description.narrative:
Enabling environment for SME and Entrepreneurship whit aim for faster economic growth and thereby contributes to poverty alleviation, thought removal business barriers
Global Entrepreneurship Monitor (GEM) survey attempt to create an international benchmark for the monitoring of enterprise culture focused on the business startup process. The GEM Survey is conducted in over fifty countries and is based on a combination of national opinion poll surveys and expert opinions. Indeed GEM survey, recognizes that culture is a pattern of beliefs, norms and values that are widely shared throughout society. Inan overview of entrepreneurship, the OECD (1999) describes culture as a key pillar of the entrepreneurial economy alongside the macro economy and regulatory environment, with education playing an important role.

Output(s)
Kosovo becomes full member of GEM GEM Staff Training Adult Population Survey Completed across Kosovo National Expert Surveyed National Conference for Promotion of GEM Report /Dissemination of Report Design and Printing of Kosovo GEM Report

Target group The main target group aiming to remove business barriers are Public Institutions and Business Association.
In terms of Public Institutions, the main responsible body for addressing barriers to business with specific emphasizes to start up barriers are Ministry of Trade and Industry (Kosovo Investment and Promotion Support Agency) and local municipalities (Departments for Economic Developments) Other relevant public institution consist of Ministry of Labor and Social Welfare, Ministry of Culture Youth and Sports. Business Associations, mainly Kosovo Chamber of Commerce, Business Alliance of Kosovo, American Chamber of Commerce. Through this association we will have a larger impact in the lobbying in the Government of Kosovo in the context of business barriers removed. Additional relevant institution/bodies Business Service Providers such as Kosovo Business Support Center, Innovation Center Kosovo, Center for Entrepreneurship and Business Development, Encouraging Young Entrepreneurs, etc. Donor community involved in the financing and supporting of Entrepreneurship development in Kosovo Universities, Research Institutes, PhD students, MA students Entrepreneurs

mailing-address.narrative: Universum College P.O. Box PRISTINA Kosovo (XK)

recipient-country.narrative: Kosovo Do not use !!! use other Kosovo
